verses.roman:
jagadānanda beḍāya pariveśana karite
prabhura pāte bhāla-dravya dena ācambite

synonyms: jagadānanda—Jagadānanda; beḍāya—walks; pariveśana—distribution of prasāda; karite—to do; prabhura pāte—on the plate of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhāla-dravya—the first-class preparations; dena—puts; ācambite—suddenly.
translation: Jagadānanda went to distribute prasāda, and suddenly he placed all the first-class preparations on the plate of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
